main.name: Tin Erispe - UX Designer
main.description: I am a multidisciplinary UX designer with a flair for programming. I believe in creating technology that has empathy— making impactful products that are a delight to use
main.bio: I've been in the design field since 2015 and worked on diverse projects ranging from graphic layouts, to high-stake pitch decks, to Wordpress websites. But the day I found UX design, something clicked and I realized that this is the heart of everything I do. I dabble and tinker with a lot of things because my passion is creating a product that people will love to use. To see things from different perspectives helps me bring a more holistic approach to user experience and it's the kind of work that brings me joy.
main.contactmessage: I'm currently looking for opportunities! If you have a project, know of any positions available, or if you just want to say hi, please feel free to contact me:

resume.skillmessage: My tech stack and hard skills include but are not limited to:

education.description: UX design curriculum and certification developed by Google, with hands-on projects in usability testing, building wireframes and prototypes, responsive design, and more to develop all skills necessary to become a professional UX designer

Alchemy provides the most extensive Ethereum development course to date. By the end of the course, I learned how to build decentralized apps that interact with EVM chains. They cover theoretical knowledge, hands-on coding bootcamp, and software kits that expedite a developer's workflow.

DigitalMarketer is the most comprehensive digital marketing training in the industry. Earners of the badge are “T-shaped” marketers who have a top-level overview of the major channels of digital marketing
